# NSTouchBarItem.Priority

**Structure**

Priorities for the visibility of a Touch Bar item.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Priority
```

## Discussion

Use these constants to set the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBarItem/visibilityPriority] property of an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBarItem] instance. The Touch Bar hides items of lower priority when there isn’t enough space to show all items.

## Priorities

- **low**: A constant indicating a low visibility priority.
- **normal**: A constant indicating a normal visibility priority.
- **high**: A constant indicating a high visibility priority.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new priority structure from the given value.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new priority structure from the given raw value.

## Managing item visibility

- **visibilityPriority**: Determines which items are shown in a bar when space is limited.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that reflects whether or not the item is visible.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Comparable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
